Lists.desc: Fixed Improved gRPC monitoring trace.
Fixed Improved transaction handling to immediately terminate when a user forcibly closes the browser window or triggers a close event.
New hook_method_patterns
Lists.details:
• Option that allows monitoring of specific methods in user applications.
  • When the method path is specified in the configuration file, the execution time and call arguments of that method are collected.
  • Default: false
    • Caution

    For TypeScript projects, specify the built file path (e.g. ./dist/services/user.service).

Lists.desc: Fixed Improved process management for the whatap_nodejs module when running multiple instances in PM2 cluster mode.
Lists.details:
• Only the first instance starts the whatap_nodejs agent.

  • The remaining instances automatically connect to the already running agent.

Lists.desc: New exit_with_parent_process_enabled
Lists.details:
• Default: false

  • If set to true, the whatap_nodejs process terminates when the application exits

    • Caution

    Node.js Agent v1.0.3 or higher

Lists.desc: Changed Introduced an independent collector process
Lists.details:
• Application name configuration

  • New data collection architecture

  • Improved PM2 cluster mode support

Lists.desc: Fixed Fixed an issue where the Container ID was not mapped in Kubernetes container environments
Lists.details:
Caution

    Supported from Kubernetes agent v1.8.8 or higher

Lists.desc: New perfx_nodejs_gc_enabled Boolean
Lists.details:
• Default: false

  • Enables collection of Garbage Collection (GC) performance metrics (Supported in Node.js version 16.7 or higher)

Lists.desc: New Detects when the application process terminates and records the termination reason in the agent log
Lists.details:
• SIGTERM: Normal termination request from the system or process manager

  • SIGINT: Interruption by the user (Ctrl+C or kill command)

  • SIGHUP: Terminal disconnection or parent process termination

  • SIGUSR1/SIGUSR2: User-defined signals

  • uncaughtException: Abnormal termination due to an unhandled exception

  • unhandledRejection: Termination due to an unhandled Promise rejection

Lists.desc: New Added monitoring support for Broadcast type in Socket.io module monitoring
Fixed Improved detection of HTTP request endpoints
New profile_mongodb_param_enabled Boolean
Lists.details:
• Default: false

  • Added an option to display actual query parameter values when tracing the mongoose module

Lists.desc: Fixed Fixed an issue where three transactions (API request, Socket.IO handshake, and polling) were recorded for a single client request when using both an HTTP server and a Socket.IO server together
Lists.details: • Now only the API request is recorded as a single transaction. Socket.IO handshake and polling requests are no longer recorded as separate transactions

Lists.desc: New ignore_env_variable_set String
Lists.details:
• No default value

  • Added an option to exclude specific environment variables from collection

  • Supports multiple values separated by commas (,)

  • Example usage: ignore_env_variable_set=ENV_1,ENV_2

Lists.desc: New Added event alarm feature triggered on transaction errors
Fixed Fixed an issue with collecting statistical data when using Prisma ORM
New Added the oracledb monitoring package.
New Added the option to use the Prisma ORM.
Lists.details:
• prisma_read_func_name String

    Default read

    Set the name of the function called to obtain a read-only client when using replication.

  • prisma_database_url_name String

    Default DATABASE_URL

    Set the environment variable name in Prisma ORM where the database connection URL is stored.

Lists.desc: New Added the database operation tracing feature when using the Prisma ORM.
Fixed Improved the automatic cleanup logic for the agent log file.
New Added monitoring for GraphQL modules (@apollo/server).
Lists.details:
• profile_graphql_enabled Boolean

    Default true

    Set whether or not to enable the GraphQL monitoring.

  • profile_graphql_variable_enabled Boolean

    Default false

    Set whether to include variables from GraphQL requests in the transaction profile.

  • ignore_graphql_operation String

    It sets monitoring of the specified operation name to be ignored. For multiple values, use comma (,) as the delimiter.

    whatap.conf
    ignore_graphql_operation=operationNameA,operationNameB

Lists.desc: Fixed Fixed the issue where the agent version does not appear.
Fixed Improved the metrics collection logic for ECS-environment systems.
Fixed Modified the maximum size for hitmap data transmission.
